Write down your answer Congratulations, you\'ve passed all the questions!
//LogicalActivity
Which word should be next? House, Key, Lock, __?
Each letter is replaced by another letter. Decode the word: \"BMNLO\" if you know that \"A\" is replaced by \"B\".
If \"Book\" means \"Table,\" \"Table\" means \"Window,\" and \"Window\" means \"Door,\" what does a person go through to enter a room?
What corresponds to \"tree\" in the same way that \"ocean\" corresponds to \"water\"?
If you turn a container with the open top westward, where will the contents fall? Will fall on the … side
What comes next in this sequence? Water, Ice, Steam, __?
It\'s a five-letter word, second letter "o", fourth letter "l". It\'s something you can eat. What\'s that word?
An image of a book resting on your ear. What is this popular expression?
Identify the next number in the sequence: 2, 4, 8, 16, __?
If the clock reads 3:15, what angle do the hour and minute hands form? … degree
That\`s all!
Sorry, but your answer is not correct!
Your answer is correct!
//MathsActivity
//MemoryActivity Wealth Authenticity Relaxation Spontaneity Variability Justice Exoticism Gratitude Amplitude 23 + 58 = __? 2 + 2 * 2 = __? 9 * 25 = __? 254 + 960 / 4 = __? 2 * 2 + 95 + 84 * 9 = __? Try again
